text:
@SpeakerPelosi Let's compare 136,938 COVID deaths (0.04% of US population) to LEADING CAUSES OF DEATH:

Heart disease 647,457
Cancer 599,108
Chronic lower respiratory diseases 160,201
Stroke 146,383

Almost 5 TIMES MORE DEATHS from Heart Disease means NO PANDEMIC, Mask Law a FRAUD!

#COVID19 https://t.co/ePi4rxH72z
